00005 #include "examples/tumbler/transforms.h"
00006 
00007 #include <math.h>
00008 #include <string.h>
00009 #include <GLES2/gl2.h>
00010 
00011 namespace transform_4x4 {
00012 
00013 static const GLfloat kPI = 3.1415926535897932384626433832795f;
00014 
00015 void Translate(GLfloat* m, GLfloat tx, GLfloat ty, GLfloat tz) {
00016   m[12] += (m[0] * tx + m[4] * ty + m[8] * tz);
00017   m[13] += (m[1] * tx + m[5] * ty + m[9] * tz);
00018   m[14] += (m[2] * tx + m[6] * ty + m[10] * tz);
00019   m[15] += (m[3] * tx + m[7] * ty + m[11] * tz);
00020 }
00021 
00022 void Frustum(GLfloat* m,
00023              GLfloat left,
00024              GLfloat right,
00025              GLfloat bottom,
00026              GLfloat top,
00027              GLfloat near_z,
00028              GLfloat far_z) {
00029   GLfloat delta_x = right - left;
00030   GLfloat delta_y = top - bottom;
00031   GLfloat delta_z = far_z - near_z;
00032   GLfloat frustum[16];
00033 
00034   if ((near_z <= 0.0f) || (far_z <= 0.0f) ||
00035      (delta_x <= 0.0f) || (delta_y <= 0.0f) || (delta_z <= 0.0f))
00036      return;
00037 
00038   frustum[0] = 2.0f * near_z / delta_x;
00039   frustum[1] = frustum[2] = frustum[3] = 0.0f;
00040 
00041   frustum[5] = 2.0f * near_z / delta_y;
00042   frustum[4] = frustum[6] = frustum[7] = 0.0f;
00043 
00044   frustum[8] = (right + left) / delta_x;
00045   frustum[9] = (top + bottom) / delta_y;
00046   frustum[10] = -(near_z + far_z) / delta_z;
00047   frustum[11] = -1.0f;
00048 
00049   frustum[14] = -2.0f * near_z * far_z / delta_z;
00050   frustum[12] = frustum[13] = frustum[15] = 0.0f;
00051 
00052   transform_4x4::Multiply(m, frustum, m);
00053 }
00054 
00055 
00056 void Perspective(GLfloat* m, 
00057                  GLfloat fovy,
00058                  GLfloat aspect,
00059                  GLfloat near_z,
00060                  GLfloat far_z) {
00061   GLfloat frustum_w, frustum_h;
00062 
00063   frustum_h = tanf((fovy * 0.5f) / 180.0f * kPI) * near_z;
00064   frustum_w = frustum_h * aspect;
00065   transform_4x4::Frustum(m, -frustum_w, frustum_w, -frustum_h, frustum_h,
00066                          near_z, far_z);
00067 }
00068 
00069 void Multiply(GLfloat *m, GLfloat *a, GLfloat* b) {
00070   GLfloat tmp[16];
00071   // tmp = a . b
00072   GLfloat a0, a1, a2, a3;
00073   a0 = a[0]; a1 = a[1]; a2 = a[2]; a3 = a[3];
00074   tmp[0] = a0 * b[0] + a1 * b[4] + a2 * b[8] + a3 * b[12];
00075   tmp[1] = a0 * b[1] + a1 * b[5] + a2 * b[9] + a3 * b[13];
00076   tmp[2] = a0 * b[2] + a1 * b[6] + a2 * b[10] + a3 * b[14];
00077   tmp[3] = a0 * b[3] + a1 * b[7] + a2 * b[11] + a3 * b[15];
00078 
00079   a0 = a[4]; a1 = a[5]; a2 = a[6]; a3 = a[7];
00080   tmp[4] = a0 * b[0] + a1 * b[4] + a2 * b[8] + a3 * b[12];
00081   tmp[5] = a0 * b[1] + a1 * b[5] + a2 * b[9] + a3 * b[13];
00082   tmp[6] = a0 * b[2] + a1 * b[6] + a2 * b[10] + a3 * b[14];
00083   tmp[7] = a0 * b[3] + a1 * b[7] + a2 * b[11] + a3 * b[15];
00084 
00085   a0 = a[8]; a1 = a[9]; a2 = a[10]; a3 = a[11];
00086   tmp[8] = a0 * b[0] + a1 * b[4] + a2 * b[8] + a3 * b[12];
00087   tmp[9] = a0 * b[1] + a1 * b[5] + a2 * b[9] + a3 * b[13];
00088   tmp[10] = a0 * b[2] + a1 * b[6] + a2 * b[10] + a3 * b[14];
00089   tmp[11] = a0 * b[3] + a1 * b[7] + a2 * b[11] + a3 * b[15];
00090 
00091   a0 = a[12]; a1 = a[13]; a2 = a[14]; a3 = a[15];
00092   tmp[12] = a0 * b[0] + a1 * b[4] + a2 * b[8] + a3 * b[12];
00093   tmp[13] = a0 * b[1] + a1 * b[5] + a2 * b[9] + a3 * b[13];
00094   tmp[14] = a0 * b[2] + a1 * b[6] + a2 * b[10] + a3 * b[14];
00095   tmp[15] = a0 * b[3] + a1 * b[7] + a2 * b[11] + a3 * b[15];
00096   memcpy(m, tmp, sizeof(GLfloat) * 4 * 4);
00097 }
00098 
00099 void LoadIdentity(GLfloat* m) {
00100   memset(m, 0, sizeof(GLfloat) * 4 * 4);
00101   m[0] = m[5] = m[10] = m[15] = 1.0f;
00102 }
00103 
00104 }  // namespace transform_4x4
